name: EREBUS (TaraByte_tm, Flotsammi)
description:
Erebus is a  Greek god that personifies Darkness. His goal, in this walking sim, is to capture Hermes Item of peace, his Scepter. Doing this will bring him one step closer to his overall goal, cause chaos. With chaos brings darkness.

This is a walking sim created on GB Studio.

*Please click on the screen, play area or push A to hear the music, you only need to click once.*

<Mobile>

D pad = Walk

A = Jump/  Dialogue speed up/ Continue

Select = Shift/ Start (when prompted)

Start = Enter/ Credits/ Menu (when prompted)

<PC / Mac>

WASD = walk

Z = Jump/  Dialogue speed up/ Continue

Enter/ Return = Start (when prompted)

Shift = Credits/ Menu (when prompted)

SONGS BY  https://www.reddit.com/user/valdezv666/ 

- Song-a.mod

-Song-b.mod

-Song-c.mod

Tittle page inspired by  Yliade.art  Instagram
